text:
Не совсем по тематике канала, но все же. NLP профессор, Хельсинки. 64-96k / год, помощник 50-68,5k / год
```We are inviting applications from experts in natural language processing and empirical linguistics with a focus on the development and application of translation technology to lower linguistic barriers that cause inequalities in society. We expect work that emphasizes the methodology in applied research within a strong cross-disciplinary framework and require competence in digital humanities as well as experience with data-driven technology.```
<https://www.helsinki.fi/en/open-positions/tenure-track-or-full-professor-in-linguistic-inequalities-and-translation-technology-ineq>
